data.text: @DianeKovacs Koko was undeniably able to express humor, love and so many other emotions that had been assumed to be exclusively human. Her teachers must be devastated, but we've all lost a pioneering spirit. RIP sweet one.🤟
@DianeKovacs I remember watching a Koko documentary years ago, but not with her kitten. I wonder how she’d reincarnate? 🌺
